page.title: 07The Fire Service
page.content: There is a fire service in Duffield and the station is in Snake Lane next to the recreation ground (Gray's Field). They have one fire engine and a Landrover.The engine holds{400 gallons.{The fire chief lives in {Duffield, his name is Ken Revel. There are{7}firemen working part-time at Duffield fire station.Altogether there are{36}hoses and{6}people crew the fire engine. One boy writing this called{Simon { Grocock}has a dad who is a part-timer at Duffield.The fire service in Duffield has been working since about { 1917.} In the winter the average number of calls for fires is twice per week,but there are calls for other emergencies.
